dc_creator_sm: Research Data Services (RDS), Columbia University Libraries
dc_description_s: This is a scanned version of the paper map entitled: Java, Madura & Bali 1:250,000 published by the  United States. Army Map Service. This map consists of twenty one sheets, the online linkage file provides the index sheet and a polygon layer that serves an index for downloading the other twenty sheets.  To download the map sheets using this index in ArcMap, add the layer, open the layer properties dialog, select the display tab, and check the "support hyperlinks using field" box while selecting the URL field in the dropdown menu. Then use the hyperlinks tool to select the polygon representing the desired tile.  These map sheets were scanned at 300 dots per inch and are in the TIFF format.
